snippet: The Jets spiced up their kicking competition, signing the veteran Josh Brown to challenge the incumbent Nick Folk in training camp.
abstract: New York Jets sign veteran kicker Josh Brown. (S)
lead_paragraph: The Jets spiced up their kicking competition, signing the veteran Josh Brown to challenge the incumbent Nick Folk in training camp. The team has not announced the signing, but the move was confirmed by a football executive with knowledge of the deal. Brown, 33, made 21 of 28 field-goal attempts last season for the Rams, who released him after drafting a kicker on Saturday.
